summary: An American man marries a Serbian immigrant who fears that she will turn into the cat person of her homeland's fables if they are intimate together.
cast: Simone Simon|Kent Smith|Tom Conway|Jane Randolph|Jack Holt|Henrietta Burnside|Alec Craig|Eddie Dew|Elizabeth Dunne|Dynamite|Dot Farley|Mary Halsey|Theresa Harris|Charles Jordan|Donald Kerr|Connie Leon|Murdock MacQuarrie|Alan Napier|John Piffle|Betty Roadman|Elizabeth Russell|Stephen Soldi
title: La mujer pantera
